data.eml:eml: A new species of Amphipoea Billberg, 1820, from northwestern Iran (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zahiri, Reza, Fibiger, Michael (2006): A new species of Amphipoea Billberg, 1820, from northwestern Iran (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae). Zootaxa 1244: 33-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172909
